content: As the ball breaks through, get ready to run to the next section on the left. This one will be empty of any enemies. Continue forward, and it's another gap on the left you'll be dashing into. This time, there will be a green Wisp, and a bit further up, there's a Searing-Fire waiting for you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
As the ball breaks through, get ready to run to the next section on the left. This one will be empty of any enemies. Continue forward, and it's another gap on the left you'll be dashing into. This time, there will be a green Wisp, and a bit further up, there's a Searing-Fire waiting for you.
